title: Scammers in Consumer Care Helpline
selftext: Filed a complain on consumer portal, next day got a scam call, scammer promising refund, asking me to install remote desktop tool. Wasted his time and blocked him.
cleaned_text: scammers consumer care helpline filed complain consumer portal next day got scam call scammer promising refund asking install remote desktop tool wasted time blocked
